desc: This opportunity to investigate in depth a topic of interest, typically culminating in a library research-based paper, is strongly recommended as preparation for Psychology 398. Prerequisite: Psychology 125, at least three courses in the department, and permission of instructor. Psychology 230 is strongly recommended. Offered each semester.
name: IS/Neurosci of Happiness
prerequisites: Prerequisite: Psychology 125, at least three courses in the department, and permission of instructor. Psychology 230 is strongly recommended. Offered each semester.
title: Independent Study
